beach_tours_india.title: Beach Tours in India
beach_tours_india.subtitle: Discover the pristine coastlines and tropical paradises along India's magnificent shorelines
beach_tours_india.description: Experience the sun, sand, and sea with our carefully curated beach tours across India's stunning coastlines. From the party beaches of Goa to the serene shores of Andaman, pristine beaches of Kerala to the scenic coasts of Maharashtra, our packages offer the perfect blend of relaxation, adventure, and cultural experiences for beach lovers.
inclusions: Accommodation in beachfront resorts and hotels
One water sports activity per destination

itinerary.title: Arrival at Beach Destination
itinerary.description: Arrive at your chosen beach paradise. Check into your beachfront accommodation and spend the evening strolling along the shoreline, enjoying the sunset and a welcome dinner featuring local seafood specialties.

itinerary.title: Beach Exploration & Water Sports
itinerary.description: Full day enjoying the beach and trying various water sports like parasailing, jet skiing, or banana boat rides. Visit nearby beaches and scenic coastal spots. Evening leisure time to enjoy the beach atmosphere.

itinerary.title: Island Excursion
itinerary.description: Day trip to a nearby island or beach destination. Enjoy snorkeling, swimming, and beach picnic. Experience local marine life and coral reefs where available. Evening cultural show with regional dance and music.

itinerary.title: Coastal Heritage
itinerary.description: Visit coastal forts, temples, lighthouses, or colonial structures. Experience local fishing villages and markets. Evening cruise or boat ride to witness magnificent sunset views over the ocean.

itinerary.title: Coastal Cuisine
itinerary.description: Culinary experience focusing on local seafood and coastal delicacies. Cooking demonstration and hands-on class. Afternoon leisure time for beach relaxation or optional spa treatments.

itinerary.title: Adventure Day
itinerary.description: Engage in more adventurous beach activities like scuba diving, surfing, or deep-sea fishing based on location. Evening bonfire on the beach with local entertainment.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Morning leisure time for last beach walks or souvenir shopping. After breakfast, check-out and transfer to airport/railway station for your onward journey, taking back memories of your beach holiday.

highlights: Stay in premium beachfront accommodations with stunning ocean views
Experience thrilling water sports and marine adventures
Explore hidden beaches and secluded coastal gems
Indulge in fresh seafood and authentic coastal cuisines
Witness breathtaking sunrises and sunsets over the ocean
Discover unique coastal cultures and traditions
Enjoy personalized experiences for couples, families, and groups

accommodations.name: Seaside Resort & Spa
accommodations.description: Luxury beachfront property with private beach access, infinity pools overlooking the ocean, water sports facilities, and restaurants serving fresh seafood caught daily.

accommodations.name: Palm Beach Cottages
accommodations.description: Charming beach cottages set amidst palm groves, offering rustic luxury, private verandas, beach hammocks, and authentic coastal dining experiences.

accommodations.name: Ocean View Hotel
accommodations.description: Contemporary property with panoramic sea views, modern amenities, rooftop infinity pool, multi-cuisine restaurants, and direct beach access.

accommodations.name: Coastal Eco Resort
accommodations.description: Sustainable accommodation built with local materials, featuring eco-friendly practices, organic gardens, and traditional architecture blending with coastal landscapes.

destinations.name: Goa Beach Extravaganza
destinations.description: Experience the vibrant beach culture of India's most famous coastal destination. This package covers North and South Goa beaches, offering a perfect mix of relaxation, nightlife, water sports, and Portuguese heritage exploration.

activities: Arrival at Dabolim Airport and transfer to North Goa hotel
Evening at Baga Beach with sunset views
Dinner at popular beach shack with live music
Water sports at Calangute Beach (parasailing, jet skiing, banana boat)
Visit to Anjuna Flea Market (Wednesdays only) or Mapusa Market
Afternoon at Vagator Beach and Chapora Fort
Evening pub crawl in Baga-Calangute strip
Old Goa heritage tour (Basilica of Bom Jesus, Se Cathedral)
Spice plantation tour with traditional Goan lunch
Evening Sunset Cruise on Mandovi River with cultural show
Visit to Colva and Benaulim Beaches
Morning yoga session on the beach
Visit to Butterfly Beach (accessible by boat)
Shopping for souvenirs and Goan specialties

destinations.name: Kerala Coastal Serenity
destinations.description: Discover the tranquil beaches of God's Own Country. This package covers the scenic beaches of Kovalam, Varkala, and Marari, combined with backwater experiences, offering a peaceful retreat with Ayurvedic therapies and cultural insights.

activities: Arrival at Trivandrum airport and transfer to Kovalam
Welcome dinner with Kerala seafood specialties
Beach hopping to Hawa Beach and Samudra Beach
Sunset catamaran ride with local fishermen
Visit to Varkala Beach and Papanasam Beach
Dinner at cliff-top restaurant with ocean views
Morning nature walk along Varkala cliff
Visit to Kappil Beach and Lake
Transfer to Marari Beach (3 hours drive)
Cooking class featuring Kerala fish curry
Morning at leisure on Marari Beach

destinations.name: Andaman Island Bliss
destinations.description: Explore the pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters of the Andaman Islands. This package covers Port Blair, Havelock, and Neil Island, offering world-class beaches, coral reefs, and marine adventures in this tropical paradise.

activities: Arrival at Port Blair and hotel check-in
Visit Cellular Jail and Light & Sound show
Evening at Radhanagar Beach (Asia's Best Beach)
Coral reef exploration with marine biologist
Scuba diving session for beginners at Nemo Reef
Visit to Bharatpur and Laxmanpur Beaches
Glass-bottom boat ride over coral reefs
Morning visit to Ross Island and North Bay

destinations.name: Konkan Coast Explorer
destinations.description: Discover the unspoiled beaches of Maharashtra's Konkan coast. This package covers Alibaug, Murud, Kashid, and Tarkarli, offering pristine beaches, historic sea forts, authentic Malvani cuisine, and tranquil coastal experiences away from the crowds.

activities: Departure from Mumbai to Alibaug (ferry or road)
Visit to Alibaug Beach and orientation walk
Evening visit to Kolaba Fort during low tide
Visit to Tarkarli and Devbag beaches
Backwater boat ride to Tsunami Island
Morning snorkeling or scuba diving experience
Visit to Malvan market for spices and souvenirs

destinations.name: East Coast Odyssey
destinations.description: Explore the diverse beaches of India's East Coast. This package covers the beaches of Odisha, Pondicherry, and Tamil Nadu, offering a mix of spiritual experiences, French colonial charm, and pristine shorelines with unique cultural insights.

activities: Arrival at Bhubaneswar and transfer to Puri
Evening visit to Jagannath Temple (exterior for non-Hindus)
Morning rituals and sunrise at beach
Fresh seafood experience at local restaurant
Flight to Chennai and transfer to Mahabalipuram
Visit to Shore Temple and Five Rathas
Evening at Promenade Beach and Rock Beach
French and Tamil fusion cooking class
Evening cycling tour along the promenade
Morning yoga session on the beach
Farewell lunch with South Indian seafood

destinations.name: Gujarat Coastal Heritage
destinations.description: Discover the hidden beaches and coastal heritage of Gujarat. This package covers Diu, Somnath, and Dwarka, offering a unique blend of Portuguese colonial history, pilgrimage sites, pristine beaches, and rich maritime heritage.

activities: Arrival at Diu (flight or road from Ahmedabad)
Visit to Diu Fort and St. Paul's Church
Visit to Naida Caves and Diu Museum
Sound and Light show at temple complex
Evening Aarti ceremony at Gomti Ghat
Morning visit to Beyt Dwarka by ferry
Shopping for seashell crafts and souvenirs
